word: Suddenly the gloom lifted from the cross, and in clear, trumpetlike tones, that seemed to resound throughout creation, Jesus cried, \93It is finished.\94\93Father, into Thy hands I commend My spirit.\94 A light encircled the cross, and the face of the Saviour shone with a glory like the sun. He then bowed His head upon His breast, and died.  Ibid., pp. 749-756.64
